definition: to spread out/to open up/to exhibit/to put into effect/to postpone/to prolong/exhibition
slow/unhurried/sluggish/gradual/not tense/relaxed/to postpone/to defer/to stall/to stave off/to revive/to recuperate

sentences.english: China's co-financed railway is progressing at a quite slow speed.
sentences.chinese: 所以，中国合资铁路发展缓慢。

sentences.english: During the world’s first Industrial Revolution, which began in England, branding was slow to develop.
sentences.chinese: 第一次工业革命发生在英国，那时品牌的发展缓慢。

sentences.english: Earthquake migration along the northern border of the Pacific Ocean developed slowly.
sentences.chinese: 沿太平洋北缘的地震迁移发展缓慢。

sentences.english: In china the development of technological rationality is laggardly because of the effect from traditional literature.
sentences.chinese: 在中国，受传统文化的影响，技术理性发展缓慢。

sentences.english: But teasing out the culinary panacea has been slow going.
sentences.chinese: 但取笑厨房里的灵丹妙药一直发展缓慢。

sentences.english: The economy has slowed since the Suharto era.
sentences.chinese: 从苏哈托时代后经济发展缓慢了。

sentences.english: They are of long duration and generally slow progression.
sentences.chinese: 这类疾病的病程较长，并且通常情况下病程发展缓慢。

sentences.english: Lvliang's slow development of the rural economy has much to do with weak education.
sentences.chinese: 吕梁市农村经济发展缓慢与其教育薄弱有很大关系。

sentences.english: Slower growth has the reverse effect.
sentences.chinese: 经济发展缓慢则有相反效果。

sentences.english: The modernization process in Huaihai region is slow though it starts early.
sentences.chinese: 淮海地区现代化起步早，但发展缓慢。

sentences.english: In the dry farming and stockbreeding area, economy develops slowly, and farmers are bad- ly off.
sentences.chinese: 干旱农牧区经济发展缓慢，群众生活十分困难。

sentences.english: They have an early onset and the disease progresses more slowly, ” continues Dr. Rosales.
sentences.chinese: 他们发病早，但疾病发展缓慢。

sentences.english: The south edge of Tarim Basin, a far end countryside, has undeveloped traffic facility, it's economy developing slowly.
sentences.chinese: 塔里木南缘县域地处边远，交通不便，经济发展缓慢。

sentences.english: What is the reason that led to the creation of the slow development?
sentences.chinese: 那又是什么原因导致了创造学在发展缓慢呢？

sentences.english: Connections to the outside world encroached slowly.
sentences.chinese: 重庆与外部世界的联系发展缓慢。

definition: a lull (in the storm)/brief break (in rain)
famine repeats unceasingly (idiom, from Book of Songs)
lit. slow no aid to urgent (idiom); slow measures will not address a critical situation/too slow to meet a pressing need
to restore (deposed monarch, rule, system of laws, ecological system etc)/restoration
to hurry forward on an expedition/to drive fast
